TopicTitle: What mod removes Bill, Bob, Jeb and Valentina? RO? RP-0

Articles.Content:
Or some other mod? I started playing with RO/RP-0 recently.

These guys are missing....
What mods do you have installed? My own Kerbal Renamer will remove those four by default.

What mods do you have installed? My own Kerbal Renamer will remove those four by default.

I have these mods:

Not for me, it doesn't.

I've used several of those addons, without losing my original four. I've left the ones that I haven't used in the quote.

I found culprit: Its Kerbal Renamer

This mod comes along with RO/RP-0 mods when installing with CKAN

Working as designed.

butbutbut these four is my favorite - I don't let them die unlike others lol.

Letting them (regural kerbals) outside on surface of Venus, hurling them at Sun and tropping them in atmosphere of Jupiter is fun lol
